text: Marge Ellis is a former international lawn bowler and national team manager from South Africa. ==Bowls career== She won a silver medal in the fours as an injury replacement bowler, when called in from her managers position, at the 1996 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Leamington Spa with Jannie de Beer, Barbara Redshaw, Lorna Trigwell and Hester Bekker. ==References== Category:South African female bowls players Category:South African sportswomen Category:1926 births Category:Living people
title: Marge Ellis
